attributes.action: Block UK Government Law to monitor all Internet, email, text and phone calls (2012)
attributes.additional_details:
The current UK Government intends to implement Law in the very near future that will force Service Providers to allow Government Organisations real-time access to anybody's Phone Calls, Texts, Emails and all Internet activitiy at any time.

Vote "yes" if you agree to this being implemented, and thereby forfeiting your personal rights to privacy

VOTE "NO" if you object to any or all of the intentions such Laws and monitoring will introduce - your loss of privacy over all Telecommunications media every day of your Life, forever more.

This Petition does not seek 100,000 "NO" Votes...
This Petition offers every UK Citizen the opportunity to protect your personal privacy by voting "NO" now... be 1 in millions to Vote NOW
